kodkod.ast.operator

Enum ExprOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ExprOperator>
      • kodkod.ast.operator.ExprOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ExprOperator>

    public enum ExprOperator
extends Enum<ExprOperator>
    Enumerates unary (~, ^, *), binary (+, &, ++, ->, -, .) and nary (+, &, ++, ->) expression operators.
    Specfields:
    op: (int->lone Expression) -> Expression
    Invariants:
    all args: seq Expression, out: Expression | args->out in op => (out.children = args && out.op = this)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CLOSURE
      Transitive closure (^) operator.
      DIFFERENCE
      Relational difference (-) operator.
      INTERSECTION
      Relational intersection (&) operator.
      JOIN
      Relational join (.) operator.
      OVERRIDE
      Relational override (++) operator.
      PRODUCT
      Relational product (->) operator.
      REFLEXIVE_CLOSURE
      Reflexive transitive closure (*) operator.
      TRANSPOSE
      Transpose (~) operator.
      UNION
      Relational union (+) operator.
